data: {"generalSituation":"A fresh easterly airstream will affect the coast of Guangdong today, it will be cloudier over the region. The easterly airstream will moderate tomorrow. A dry northeast monsoon is expected to bring mainly fine weather to the coastal areas in the middle to latter parts of this week, it will be mild during the day over the region. Besides, an area of low pressure will bring unsettled weather to the seas east of the Philippines in the middle to latter parts of this week.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260112","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 3 to 4, force 5 at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
